transition.tag: If Condition is True, Transition to ...
Go to Set up the Target
Always Go to Define next Target

action.tag: Flip coin for next alpha sign
If coin == 0 set n_alpha to positive
If coin == 1 set n_alpha to negative
If the shift is set to be time dependent

transition.tag: Always Go to Update Stimulus

action.tag: Throw a dice coin to decide if target will be shown

transition.tag: Always Go to Update Stimulus

action.tag: While the Switch Duration Timer is active ...
If the shift is set to linear
Set RDP motion to linear increase
If the shift is set to be step dependent
Set RDP motion according to updated alpha

transition.tag: If FrameTimer Expired, Transition to Update Stimulus
If SteadyStateDurationTimer has Expired, and Target phase is 0, go to Flash the Target
If Target timer has expired and no target was presented go to Set up the Target
If Inter Event Interval timer has expired and target was presented go to Missed
If Target phase 1, and cursor on Target, go to Deliver Reward
If Cursor out of RDP area, go to Abort the Trial
Always Go to Set Up the Target
Always Go to Set Up the Target
Always Go to Make Target Disappear

action.message: !!! cursor out of area: Trial Aborted

transition.tag: Always Go to End Trial
If Maximum Score has been reached, go to End Experiment
If Feedback Refresh Timer has Expired but Timer Feedback has not expired, reload Make Target Disappear
If Timer for Feedback Expired, Transition to End Trial
If Cursor outside starting area, go to End Trial
If Timer has expired and Cursor inside Start area, go to Wait For Joystick
If Timer Expired, Transition to Exit Expired
Exit Task System...
